name: Beans (aarn)
description:
Beans: The High Pressure Medieval Sales Sim

Thank you for playing Beans!  It was made over the course of 2 days for the 23rd GDL September Game Jam.  

Controls:
Left-Click on the buttons to take that action.

Actions:
-> Move, still facing the same direction

|_> Move & Rotate

-X Don't move, but possibly rotate.
